description:
For our first post-ACCU Conference meeting, I thought it would be good to have a social.

So to that end, I propose that we have a conference retrospective, discussing the best bits of the conference, and which speakers would you like to see give a talk at ACCU Bristol in the near future.

We'll be meeting initially at the Brewdog.  I say initially as I've been trying to get hold of them to book us a table, however, I've not got hold of anyone via phone or e-mail.  So we'll take our chance.  

If it's too busy, then I'm sure we'll be able to find an alternative venue.

So bring your ACCU programme if you have one, I have a bunch I'll bring with me, and we'll go through it and chew the fat.

Hope to see you there.
title: ACCU Conference Retrospective
